Weighted semantic similarity

Source: R/calcSemanticSimilarity.R
weightedBMA.Rd

Incorporation of weights into the computation of semantic similarity

Usage

weightedBMA(
  o,
  ic,
  set1,
  set2,
  weights1 = rep(1, length(set1)),
  weights2 = rep(1, length(set2))
)

Arguments

o

ontology. An object of class ontology_index.

ic

information content. Typically obtained via ontologySimilarity::descendants_IC(o).

set1

character. First term set.

set2

character. Secound term set.

weights1

numeric. Weights for each term of the first term set, ie. must be parallel to set1.

weights2

numeric. Weights for each term of the second term set, ie. must be parallel to set2.

Value

a numeric value expressing semantic similarity between the two input term sets, weighted by the given individual term weights.

On this page

Developed by Ludwig Geistlinger, Levi Waldron.
